channel.title: Ultimate Packet Documentation
channel.description:
I thought I would throw together a list of all the packets I know of for all revisions. I used the 2 packet documentations that are stickied for this. I might turn this into a full RS2 private server doc. Will have emotes, ids, and all. For now it is just packets
[size=14pt]317[/size] [size=12pt]Server-Side:[/size] 0 - Ping timeout 3 - Client focus change 4 - public chat, sent when a player says something 14 - use an item on a player 16 - an alternate item option, like clicking teleport on a glory, for example 17 - click second NPC option 18 - click fourth NPC option 21 - click third NPC option 25 - use item on ground item 35 - use magic on an object 41 - equip item packet 43 - bank 10 items/sell 5 items 53 - use item on item 57 - use item on NPC 60 - type a name into enter name interface (this is shown when the client receives packet 187) 70 - the third object clicking packet 72 - attack NPC 73 - attack a player 74 - remove from ignore list 75 - another alternate item option 86 - sent when the camera angle changes 87 - drop item packet 95 - update public chat, trade/duel, and private chat (on, off, friend and for public chat hide) 101 - update appearance changes on character design screen 103 - command packet, sent when user executes a :: command 117 - bank 5 items/sell 1 item 120 - sent when a flashing sidebar tab is clicked (the packet to make the tab flash is 24, and writeByteA is used to write the ID of the tab, which must be 0 to 13 or 0 to 12, I don't know if it counts the blank tab) 121 - sent when changing map region 122 - sent when using an using an item such as food or bones, which have a unique first click option (bandages would be another example) 126 - send a private message 128 - click first player option 129 - bank all items/buy 10 items 130 - sent when clicking some buttons in game, like report abuse, for example 131 - use magic on an NPC 132 - the first object clicking packet 133 - add to ignore list 135 - bank x items 139 - accept trade 145 - remove item packet 153 - click second player option 155 - click first NPC option 181 - use magic on ground item 185 - sent when clicking most buttons 188 - add friend 192 - use item on object 202 - idle logout packet 208 - type an amount into enter amount interface (this is shown when the client receives packet 27) 210 - sent when changing map region 214 - sent when player swaps position of items in inventory 215 - remove friend 218 - report a player 228 - the fifth object clicking packet 234 - the fourth object clicking packet 236 - pick an item up off the ground 237 - use magic on an item 241 - clicking packet 249 - use magic on a player 252 - the second object clicking packet 253 - alternate option for clicking item on ground, like lighting a log, for example _____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[size=12pt]Client-Side:[/size] 24 - makes a sidebar tab flash 27 - shows enter amount interface 34 - write items to inventory 35 - shakes the camera, looks like an earthquake 36 - adjusts the volume 50 - updates a friend's online status and world in friends list 68 - resets game options and player controls to their original positions 71 - set the interface ID of a sidebar tab 74 - looks like it plays music 78 - makes the flag on the mini-map disappear 87 - adjusts the volume 97 - shows an interface 99 - makes the mini-map black and unclickable (the recieved value is meant to be 0 to reset it to normal or 2 to make it black, but anything other than 0 or 2 will only make it unclickable) 104 - creates an option in the right click player menu 106 - changes selected sidebar tab 107 - resets the boolean array in packet 35, stopping the earthquake 109 - logs client out 114 - system update 121 - also looks like it plays music, but it's different than packet 74 126 - "sendquest" 134 - get the level and experience to the next level of a skill 142 - shows an interface over your inventory and removes the sidebar icons 164 - shows an interface over that chat box 166 - changes the camera view 176 - sets the information in the welcome screen and opens it 177 - changes the camera view 187 - shows enter name interface 196 - displays a private message 206 - sets public chat, trade/duel, and private chat depending on the recieved data 208 - shows an interface normally, but you can't interact with it and you can still walk 214 - replace all the names on the ignore list with the one received by the client 218 - shows an interface over the chat box, additionally, any sendMessage text will be displayed over the chat with the click to continue interface 219 - closes all interfaces 221 - friends/ignore list loading status (0, 1, 2 and 3 are the options, but everything above 3 will display the same message as 3 does) 248 - shows an interface on the game screen as well as on your inventory 253 - sendMessage (also handles trade and duel requests depending on whether the recieved String ends with :duelreq: :tradereq: or :chalreq:) I haven't tested chalreq
[size=14pt]474[/size] 21 - Talk to a NPC 31 - First click object 35 - Magic on Players 41 - Dismantle a GodSword 47 - Item Examine 71 - Dropping an Item 134 - Item on Object 151 - Close a Interface 157 - Magic on NPC 160 - Second Click NPC 178 - Examine an NPC 185 - Follow a Player 196 - Attack an NPC 204 - Item on Player 206 - Item on Item 226 - Examine a Object 234 - Prayer Button Clicking 236 - Seems to be something to do with Idle Logout. 238 - Magic on a Item 247 - Trade a Player
[size=14pt]481[/size] 4 - items 6 - Has to do with Adding Player Options 35 - Has to do with Interfaces Being Shown 36 - Writes Item Images on Interfaces 61 - Clicking Inveytory Area 79 - The "King" Packets 95 - Have to do with First Click 98 - NPC Chat Stuff 103 - Recieve a Private Message 134 - Read the Skill Information 146 - ChatBox Stuff 152 - Changing Tabs? 154 - Changing Chat Box Tabs(All, Game, Public, Private, ext ext)-Regular tab changing too 155 - has to do with first click 189 - has to do with login 198 - Has to do with Click To Walk 206 - Reads Private Message Information 213 - Camera Movement 219 - Loading Stuff 242 - LogOut-causes disconnections (suspected) 248 - Has to do with Right Clicking 249 - Click to Walk on MiniMap 252 - Skills (exp, id etc etc.) 254 - Update Players
[size=14pt]503[/size] 23 - Third click object 27 - First click object 67 - Second click object 129 - Fourth click object 163 - Tabclicking 207 - Examine
Well that is all that I have :) Have a good time with those..

item.title: Ultimate Packet Documentation
item.dc:creator: @_bool
item.description:
@_bool wrote:

Tanks homie :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 24, 2008, 12:53:36 pm[/size][hr]Lol, 7 views, the important things are the things no one uses.

Read full topic

item.title: Ultimate Packet Documentation
item.dc:creator: @_bool
item.description:
@_bool wrote:

I thought I would throw together a list of all the packets I know of for all revisions.
I used the 2 packet documentations that are stickied for this.
I might turn this into a full RS2 private server doc.
Will have emotes, ids, and all.
For now it is just packets

[size=14pt]317[/size]
[size=12pt]Server-Side:[/size]
0 - Ping timeout
3 - Client focus change
4 - public chat, sent when a player says something
14 - use an item on a player
16 - an alternate item option, like clicking teleport on a glory, for example
17 - click second NPC option
18 - click fourth NPC option
21 - click third NPC option
25 - use item on ground item
35 - use magic on an object
41 - equip item packet
43 - bank 10 items/sell 5 items
53 - use item on item
57 - use item on NPC
60 - type a name into enter name interface (this is shown when the client receives packet 187)
70 - the third object clicking packet
72 - attack NPC
73 - attack a player
74 - remove from ignore list
75 - another alternate item option
86 - sent when the camera angle changes
87 - drop item packet
95 - update public chat, trade/duel, and private chat (on, off, friend and for public chat hide)
101 - update appearance changes on character design screen
103 - command packet, sent when user executes a :: command
117 - bank 5 items/sell 1 item
120 - sent when a flashing sidebar tab is clicked (the packet to make the tab flash is 24, and writeByteA is used to write the ID of the tab, which must be 0 to 13 or 0 to 12, I don’t know if it counts the blank tab)
121 - sent when changing map region
122 - sent when using an using an item such as food or bones, which have a unique first click option (bandages would be another example)
126 - send a private message
128 - click first player option
129 - bank all items/buy 10 items
130 - sent when clicking some buttons in game, like report abuse, for example
131 - use magic on an NPC
132 - the first object clicking packet
133 - add to ignore list
135 - bank x items
139 - accept trade
145 - remove item packet
153 - click second player option
155 - click first NPC option
181 - use magic on ground item
185 - sent when clicking most buttons
188 - add friend
192 - use item on object
202 - idle logout packet
208 - type an amount into enter amount interface (this is shown when the client receives packet 27)
210 - sent when changing map region
214 - sent when player swaps position of items in inventory
215 - remove friend
218 - report a player
228 - the fifth object clicking packet
234 - the fourth object clicking packet
236 - pick an item up off the ground
237 - use magic on an item
241 - clicking packet
249 - use magic on a player
252 - the second object clicking packet
253 - alternate option for clicking item on ground, like lighting a log, for example

[size=12pt]Client-Side:[/size]
24 - makes a sidebar tab flash
27 - shows enter amount interface
34 - write items to inventory
35 - shakes the camera, looks like an earthquake
36 - adjusts the volume
50 - updates a friend’s online status and world in friends list
68 - resets game options and player controls to their original positions
71 - set the interface ID of a sidebar tab
74 - looks like it plays music
78 - makes the flag on the mini-map disappear
87 - adjusts the volume
97 - shows an interface
99 - makes the mini-map black and unclickable (the recieved value is meant to be 0 to reset it to normal or 2 to make it black, but anything other than 0 or 2 will only make it unclickable)
104 - creates an option in the right click player menu
106 - changes selected sidebar tab
107 - resets the boolean array in packet 35, stopping the earthquake
109 - logs client out
114 - system update
121 - also looks like it plays music, but it’s different than packet 74
126 - “sendquest”
134 - get the level and experience to the next level of a skill
142 - shows an interface over your inventory and removes the sidebar icons
164 - shows an interface over that chat box
166 - changes the camera view
176 - sets the information in the welcome screen and opens it
177 - changes the camera view
187 - shows enter name interface
196 - displays a private message
206 - sets public chat, trade/duel, and private chat depending on the recieved data
208 - shows an interface normally, but you can’t interact with it and you can still walk
214 - replace all the names on the ignore list with the one received by the client
218 - shows an interface over the chat box, additionally, any sendMessage text will be displayed over the chat with the click to continue interface
219 - closes all interfaces
221 - friends/ignore list loading status (0, 1, 2 and 3 are the options, but everything above 3 will display the same message as 3 does)
248 - shows an interface on the game screen as well as on your inventory
253 - sendMessage (also handles trade and duel requests depending on whether the recieved String ends with :duelreq: :tradereq: or :chalreq:) I haven’t tested chalreq

[size=14pt]474[/size]
21 - Talk to a NPC
31 - First click object
35 - Magic on Players
41 - Dismantle a GodSword
47 - Item Examine
71 - Dropping an Item
134 - Item on Object
151 - Close a Interface
157 - Magic on NPC
160 - Second Click NPC
178 - Examine an NPC
185 - Follow a Player
196 - Attack an NPC
204 - Item on Player
206 - Item on Item
226 - Examine a Object
234 - Prayer Button Clicking
236 - Seems to be something to do with Idle Logout.
238 - Magic on a Item
247 - Trade a Player

[size=14pt]481[/size]
4 - items
6 - Has to do with Adding Player Options
35 - Has to do with Interfaces Being Shown
36 - Writes Item Images on Interfaces
61 - Clicking Inveytory Area
79 - The “King” Packets
95 - Have to do with First Click
98 - NPC Chat Stuff
103 - Recieve a Private Message
134 - Read the Skill Information
146 - ChatBox Stuff
152 - Changing Tabs?
154 - Changing Chat Box Tabs(All, Game, Public, Private, ext ext)-Regular tab changing too
155 - has to do with first click
189 - has to do with login
198 - Has to do with Click To Walk
206 - Reads Private Message Information
213 - Camera Movement
219 - Loading Stuff
242 - LogOut-causes disconnections (suspected)
248 - Has to do with Right Clicking
249 - Click to Walk on MiniMap
252 - Skills (exp, id etc etc.)
254 - Update Players

[size=14pt]503[/size]
23 - Third click object
27 - First click object
67 - Second click object
129 - Fourth click object
163 - Tabclicking
207 - Examine

Well that is all that I have
Have a good time with those…

Read full topic
